"Weapons Usable in Ranked Matches":
"Welcome to Battle Arena! Currently, you can use the five following types of weapon in Ranked Matches:

\u3000・Partizan (new)
\u3000・Twin Machinegun (new)
\u3000・Rod
\u3000・Bullet Bow
\u3000・Jet Boots

As for the details of each weapon, you can find out by asking Lavernat, who stands at the entrance to the Battle Lobby."
